sjs><input type="text" of-id="serverConsole.cliText" size="120" onkeydown="if (event.keyCode == 13) serverConsole.runCli(); if (event.keyCode == 38) serverConsole.historyCli(-1); if (event.keyCode == 40) serverConsole.historyCli(+1);">
<button class="actionButton" onClick="serverConsole.runCli();" title="Run">[{Icon name="server go"}]</button><br/>
<button class="actionButton" onClick="serverConsole.clear();" title="Clear">[{Icon name="cross"}]</button><br/>
{{serverConsole.text}}
